headline: Is Stanley Black and Decker Attractive After Recent Turnaround Efforts and Long Term Cash Flow Outlook?
summary: Wondering if Stanley Black & Decker at around $74.87 is a bargain or a value trap? You are not alone. This stock has been on many investors' watchlists for exactly that reason. In the very short term, the share price has perked up, rising about 4.1% over the last week and 11.4% over the past month. Even so, it is still down roughly 6.3% year to date and 3.4% over the last year, and far below its levels from five years ago with a 50.5% slide. Recent headlines around the stock have centered on...
